name: part_007
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら6周年記念LIVE】周年3D LIVE！ぺこらRUSH！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [E2D_YFRHFG8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora and Inugami Korone perform 'TOUGH BOY'.
Slot machine mini-game interlude titled 'Nousagi Subjugation Battle'.
Usada Pekora, IRyS, and Nerissa Ravencroft perform 'Long Shot'.

subtitles.original: どこもかしこも傷だらけ
subtitles.english: Everywhere is covered in wounds

subtitles.original: うずくまって泣いていてもはじまらないから
subtitles.english: Because crouching and crying won't start anything

subtitles.original: tough boy tough boy tough boy tough boy
subtitles.english: tough boy tough boy tough boy tough boy

subtitles.original: どっちを向いても feel so sad
subtitles.english: No matter which way I look, I feel so sad

subtitles.original: だけど死には至らない気分はどうだい？
subtitles.english: But it's not fatal; how do you feel?

subtitles.original: tough boy tough boy tough boy tough boy
subtitles.english: tough boy tough boy tough boy tough boy

subtitles.original: ここは永遠のロックランド
subtitles.english: This is the eternal Rockland

subtitles.original: 拳を握りしめ僕らは出会った
subtitles.english: We met with clenched fists

subtitles.original: Keep you burning 駆け抜けて
subtitles.english: Keep you burning, run through it

subtitles.original: この狂気と希望と幻滅のまっただなか
subtitles.english: Right in the midst of this madness, hope, and disillusionment

subtitles.original: No boy no cry 進まなきゃ
subtitles.english: No boy no cry, I must keep moving forward

subtitles.original: 勢いを増した向い風の中を
subtitles.english: Through the headwind that has increased in strength

subtitles.original: We are living, living in the eighties
subtitles.english: We are living, living in the eighties

subtitles.original: We still fight, fighting in the eighties
subtitles.english: We still fight, fighting in the eighties

subtitles.english: We are living, living in the eighties

subtitles.english: We still fight, fighting in the eighties

subtitles.english: We are living, living in the eighties

subtitles.original: We still fight, fighting in the eighties...
subtitles.english: We still fight, fighting in the eighties...

subtitles.original: We are living, living in the eighties
subtitles.english: We are living, living in the eighties

subtitles.original: We still fight, fighting in the eighties
subtitles.english: We still fight, fighting in the eighties

subtitles.original: 野うさぎ討伐戦 突入！
subtitles.english: Nousagi Subjugation Battle: Commencing!

subtitles.original: 1体目！
subtitles.english: 1st target!

subtitles.original: お前の英雄は超うさぎが勝ってるぺこ！
subtitles.english: Your hero is being outplayed by Super Rabbit-peko!

subtitles.original: お前の英雄は超うさぎが勝ってるぺこ！
subtitles.english: Your hero is being outplayed by Super Rabbit-peko!

subtitles.original: PUSHぺこ！
subtitles.english: PUSH peko!

subtitles.original: ごちそうさまでした！
subtitles.english: Thanks for the meal!

subtitles.original: 完全撃破！
subtitles.english: Complete annihilation!

subtitles.original: This is the fate that brought us here, watch my Long shot
subtitles.english: This is the fate that brought us here, watch my Long shot

subtitles.original: Feel like I have falling into the flame of lies
subtitles.english: Feel like I have falling into the flame of lies

subtitles.original: Tell me what you want from me
subtitles.english: Tell me what you want from me

subtitles.original: Try not to step back to where I used to belong
subtitles.english: Try not to step back to where I used to belong

subtitles.original: Looking for the escape from pain
subtitles.english: Looking for the escape from pain

subtitles.original: I will cross my fingers hoping not to be sacrificed
subtitles.english: I will cross my fingers hoping not to be sacrificed

subtitles.original: 理想像なんてどっか葬り
subtitles.english: Burying the ideal image somewhere

subtitles.original: Get in the way, get ready for the time to come
subtitles.english: Get in the way, get ready for the time to come

subtitles.original: 浮かび上がるシルエット追いかけ
subtitles.english: Chasing the silhouette that emerges

subtitles.original: Tell me the reason why I'm standing here alone
subtitles.english: Tell me the reason why I'm standing here alone

subtitles.original: Maybe it's already too late to regain
subtitles.english: Maybe it's already too late to regain

subtitles.original: 思い描いてた面影を失くさないで
subtitles.english: Don't lose the visage you envisioned

subtitles.original: I count my wrongs and save you from the pain
subtitles.english: I count my wrongs and save you from the pain

subtitles.original: It's not enough, it's not enough for me to break the rule upon this world
subtitles.english: It's not enough, it's not enough for me to break the rule upon this world

subtitles.original: I will never gonna leave you, never wanna lose you
subtitles.english: I will never gonna leave you, never wanna lose you

subtitles.original: We'll make it in the end
subtitles.english: We'll make it in the end

subtitles.original: Not backing down for real
subtitles.english: Not backing down for real

subtitles.original: I won't trace someone else's life
subtitles.english: I won't trace someone else's life

subtitles.original: I know who I am
subtitles.english: I know who I am
